name: WPTools Masonry Gallery & Posts For Divi
author: WP Tools

sections.installation:
How to install the WPTools Masonry Gallery & Posts For Divi plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload wptools-masonry-gallery-posts-for-divi folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does it work with theme `Extra`

Yes, it works with theme Extra by Elegant themes.

Do you have a premium version?

We offer a premium plugin at https://wptools.app/wordpress-plugin/masonry-gallery-and-posts-for-divi/
sections.changelog:
3.7.0

  • Fixed incompatibility with WordPress 6.5 which caused a critical error.

3.6.1

  • Freemius upgrade
  • Fixed php access level code issue

3.6.0

  • Freemius upgrade
  • PHP compatibility upto 8.1

3.5.0

  • Bug Fix: “Read More” button divi module settings visibility fixed.
  • Upgraded freemius 2.5.7
  • WordPress 6.2 compatible

3.4.3

  • Added “Next” and “Previous” label text input in “Masonry Post Type” divi module’s pagination settings

3.4.2

  • removed php requirement

3.4.1

  • Bug fix – Setting correct target for the button link.
  • Freemius 2.5.3

3.4.0

  • Added Hide Grid Until Page Load setting. If you experience janking of images on page load, enable this setting.

3.3.0

  • Added styling options for “meta link” element.
  • Fixed overlay issue on post type gallery.
  • wpt_masonry_gallery_post_item_categories_html filter added. https://gist.github.com/wpt00ls/51bdd2fe8a20bdc5474f1bdfc07543a1
  • Freemius upgraded.

3.2.1

  • Fixed issue with popup gallery arrow click button. Need to clear divi css cache.

3.2.0

  • Fixed pagination when masonry posts are on homepage.

3.1.3

  • Composer compatible with php 7.2.0

3.1.2

  • Upgraded freemius to 2.4.3
  • WordPress 5.9.1 compatible

3.1.1

  • Added Open URL In' option for "Masonry Posts" module. Options aresame windowandnew window`.

3.1.0

  • Added compatiblity for Divi 4.10+ (magnific popup fix)

3.0.1

  • Bug Fix: Fixed selector issue. Using order_class instead of main_css_element

3.0.0

  • Created “Masonry Posts” divi module.

2.0.0

  • Updated “Masonry Image Gallery” divi module with custom filters for images
  • Added categories for images.

1.0

  • Create “Masonry Image Gallery” divi module with manually uploaded images.
sections.description:
Create masonry gallery for images & blogs using divi modules. 100% visual builder compatible. No programming experience needed.

Images & Blogs Masonry Gallery Divi Modules

Create masonry gallery grid for images/blogs using our easy-to-use divi modules.

This plugin offers 2 divi modules,

  • Masonry Image Gallery Module – Creates masonry gallery of WordPress media library images.
  • Masonry Posts Module – Creates masonry gallery of custom post types like blogs, projects etc.

Masonry Image Gallery Divi Module

Use images from media library and create a masonry gallery.

  • Manually select/upload images OR query images using custom filter
  • Ability to categorize images
  • Create popover gallery on image click
  • Create overlay on image mouse-over.
  • Tons of styling options

Documentation : https://wptools.app/how-to/how-to-create-masonry-image-gallery-in-divi/

Masonry Posts Divi Module

Use blog data from custom post types to create masonry gallery.

  • Create blog items list using custom filter
  • Setup pagination
  • Create overlay on image mouse-over.
  • Tons of styling options

Documentation : https://wptools.app/how-to/how-to-create-masonry-blog-gallery-in-divi/

Premium Plugin

We offer a premium plugin at https://wptools.app/wordpress-plugin/masonry-gallery-and-posts-for-divi/

Free plugin has all the functionality of premium plugin except that it limits the number of images/blog items one can show. Premium plugin has no such limitation
